comments:
Summary error is displayed when attempting to launch workbench.
Last working on an existing but modified java source file. Attempted to save 
changes but received the following errors in continous stream before the 
workbench finally closed down : can't save file. file does not exist on the 
filesystem. could not save workbench settings.
File has been removed by eclipse and changes lost.
Please assist.
Thank you.
